Articles.Content: Cables would be advanced space ship parts that would work similar to struts. However, there is one major distance: A cable would allow 2 seperate ships to move around seperately while still being connected to eachother. This would allow players to build actual skycranes, as well as using cables to tether 2 ships to eachother in space.
Kerbal attachment / inventory systems do this already when used together. But i say lets make them stock
